Yemen attacks not seen drawing Iran directly into warThe Iran-aligned Houthis of Yemen vowed to respond to attacks by the United States and Britain but the prospects of these Western strikes igniting a regional war seem limited for now as Tehran seeks to avoid getting sucked directly into all-out conflict. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 18:09:34 GMT 4JQFSIITWZOILHWOBMNRG3TGZU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemen-attacks-not-seen-drawing-iran-directly-into-war-2024-01-12/Parisa Hafezi, Ahmed Rasheed世界中东
Houthis mistakenly target tanker carrying Russian oil - Ambrey reportHouthi militants mistakenly targeted a tanker carrying Russian oil in a missile attack on Friday off Yemen, British maritime security firm Ambrey said. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 17:52:39 GMT NUNCZVGUCZK2NLPUTFAISJMHD4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/houthis-mistakenly-target-tanker-carrying- Russian-oil-ambrey-report-2024-01-12/Reuters世界中东
China coal mine accident kills at least 8, rescue ops underway - XinhuaRescue operations were underway after eight people died and 15 missing following an accident in a coal mine in the city of Pingdingshan, central China's Henan Province on Friday, state news agency Xinhua reported. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 17:39:24 GMT 2AR4H32NMZN7ZCOPQ4DSXGFLX4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/rescue-underway-chinese-coal-mine-accident-leaves-least-8-dead-xinhua-2024-01-12/Reuters世界中国
Israel makes deal with Qatar to get medicine to hostages in Gaza -Israeli PM's officeIsrael has made an arrangement with Qatar that will allow the delivery of medicines to hostages being held by Hamas in Gaza, the Israeli prime minister's office said on Friday. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 17:38:01 GMT QB7ROMUWNRKUVCTGH4ELZ2HPYM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-makes-deal-with-qatar-get-medicine-hostages-gaza-israeli-pms-office-2024-01-12/Reuters世界中东
EU lawmakers urge pressure on Hungary to respect rule of lawA group of EU lawmakers called on member states' governments on Friday to punish Hungary's Viktor Orban for damaging democracy at home by moving one step closer to suspending Budapest's vote in the bloc, a letter signed by the lawmakers showed. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 17:09:23 GMT MZPQXLIRVRKDDO2Y7LS5RCGHNE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-lawmakers-urge-Pressure-hungary-respect-rule-law-2024-01-12/Gabriela Baczynska世界欧洲
Israeli soldiers on northern border dig in and wait as tensions mountFor Israeli troops on the northern border with Lebanon, the government's strategy of avoiding full-scale war with the Hezbollah troops just a few hundred metres away is embodied in the pages of a 68-year-old training manual. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 17:08:29 GMT GMMFAUS225NHXNQCPVFAQUATRA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-soldiers-northern-border-dig-wait-tensions-mount-2024-01-12/James Mackenzie世界中东
New French foreign minister Sejourne makes first trip to Ukraine - sourcesFrance's newly appointed Foreign Minister Stephane Sejourne will make his first official trip in his new role to Ukraine this weekend, two diplomatic sources said on Friday. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 17:02:24 GMT DMFFOBMOJBJ6HPUJXLK6WBWT2M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/new-french-foreign-minister-sejourne-makes-first-trip-ukraine-sources-2024-01-12/Reuters世界欧洲
Winter weather dumps snow on US Midwest and threatens East Coast with floodingTens of millions of Americans were in the pathway of dangerous and damaging weather conditions as snowstorms bore down on the Northwest and Midwest, flooding threatened the East Coast and potential tornadoes were on tap in the South. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 17:01:03 GMT 7UXYNSFFGJJMTGKJT7E6HJXMWU https://www.reuters.com/world/us/winter-weather-dumps-snow-us-midwest-threatens-east-coast-with-flooding-2024-01-12/Brendan O'Brien, Rich Mckay世界美国

Italy blocks extradition of priest accused of Argentina junta crimesItaly's justice minister has blocked the extradition to Argentina of a priest accused of crimes against humanity during a military dictatorship in the 1970s and 1980s, a source with direct knowledge of the matter said on Friday.
